website_summaries.verdict: Very reasonably priced skincare oil from a long-trusted skincare line, for use anywhere on your body.
pros: From a long-trusted name in skincare comes this extra-absorbing formula to improve appearance of scars, stretch marks, dry, damaged skin, uneven skin tone, aging skin, and fine lines, and wrinkles
Contains no mineral-oil, parabens, or phthalates
cons: A small percentage of purchasers did not get the benefits they desired for their particular skin issue, or they did not like the fragrance

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! It is a fake! I bought this product after raving reviews from a coworker and after two months of use, I noticed no results. After going to my friends house and checking hers out, I noted not only a difference in color but a difference in smell and consistency as well. Just went to purchase another at CVS and verified the one from Amazon was a fake. The one I’m pointing to is the one from Amazon next to the one from CVS (the authentic one). Also note that even though it says scented with Rose hip oil, the ingredients are the same as the real one with no mention of Rose Hip oil.
customer_reviews.author: Osaretin S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for the scent sensitive. The product itself seemed fine, but I’m pregnant and can’t get over the smell.
customer_reviews.text: As a pregnant woman I bought a number of products to try out in keeping my skin supple as my belly grows - I can’t pinpoint why exactly but I really couldn’t get over the smell of this one, since that is such a sensitive thing for many pregnant woman I just wanted to share that in case anyone else is looking at purchasing and a little more scent sensitive at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not my personal favorite product
customer_reviews.text: This formula had been tried and true. It works really well on the skin. I used it for stretch marks during pregnancy. One thing I don’t like is that it makes my hands so oily. I feel like my hands absorb more than the skin I put it on, and even after I wash my hands, they don’t feel totally oil free. The smell is faint, but not very good. I understand this works well, but there are other types of oils/lotions that work equally well without the texture/smell issues in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for just over a month. I originally bought it for surgical scars but I've been mostly using it on my face as part of my nighttime routine. I have received so many compliments on how clear my skin is. Today even, a co-worker asked me what foundation I use and she was so surprised to hear that I had not one ounce of make up on, that's how good it looks. I will do an update review in a few months regarding how well it does on my scars (I have a lot due to complications from lupus).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Refreshing, Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Good pricing, received when expected. This has a very nice scent, not over powering. Contains rose hips which are the base of the rose flower among other things rose hips are high in vitamin C. We know vitamin C is very good for the skin. This works very nicely, a bit greasy but this "soaks in" quickly and isn't staining. As with all of Palmers products-good value, inexpensive, works as claimed. This is refreshing and has a nice subtle scent of roses.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for scars. Perfect as a moisturizer. Love the smell. Before and after photo of my foot covered with bug bites. There is a lot of improvement, almost all of the scars are gone. Been using this oil for my bite scars for a month and gave me such huge help for my scars. Would definitely recommend this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Raya Grace

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this my whole pregnancy since the moment I found out to now 8.5 months pregnant. I put it on daily religiously and I have no stretch marks as of yet. And I am prone to them as I have them on my hips and thighs already from puberty. Makes my skin so soft and smooth wish I used this my whole life lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooo soft
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this product because of a surgery I had on Sept 14. I wanted to start using a product so that I can reduce the appearance on my stomach as much as possible, especially with dark skin. This product works so well that I use it ALL over my body. I love the smell and a little goes a long way. After a shower my skin feels soft. The skin absorbs the oil fast, therefore no oily skin after. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT COCOA BUTTER AND IS ACTUALLY DRYING OUT MY SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the package, I was suspicious because the color was too orange. I usually get this at CVS, but they stopped carrying it, so I tried Amazon. BIG MISTAKE! This must be a false product, because not only was the color orange instead of gold, but it smelled more like roses, not cocoa! To top it off, I have psoriasis, so it's critical the product actually moisturize, but this DRIED MY SKIN!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! I'm just going to get this at Target from now on, to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Made me BREAKOUT!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive skin nor do I have problems with breakouts. I’ve been using this product for about a week and have broken out really bad on my chest with a red rash and little bumps. Will definitely discontinue using.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I had a staph infection that left some dark scaring after a WEEK this has lightened them up some & made them smoother. I don't think it's going to be a miracle & Take them away, But I do think it will help significantly! It absorbs well & Isn't super oily which is also a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen huff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a post-finger surgery. The scar was really sensitive and sore. I would use this twice daily and rub into my skin. You can hardly see the scar at all! Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Lalabubu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this oil for my first pregnancy and did not get a single stretch mark and it left my skin feeling so soft and moisturized. I was hooked and continued to use it on my skin for moisture especially during the dry winter months. I also noticed that a skin pigment patch on my skin that was slightly darker also evened out to where you can't even see it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D.

customer_reviews.title: Caused a rash!
customer_reviews.text: I am 23 weeks pregnant, and I have no problem using Palmer's cocoa butter. I bought this thinking it would be a great product to put on my belly for stretch marks, etc. I got a blotchy, red rash all over my stomach and inside my forearms. I assumed maybe I was just sensitive, and I offered to give the product to a friend. She also broke out in a blotchy red and itchy rash where the product was applied. I would not use this product if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about two weeks on my face at night and it makes my skin feel very smooth and moisturized. I also started derma rolling and I use this after I do that. The smell is nice, but it’s not cocoa butter. It smells more like roses but not over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my daughter (11 y/o) that suffers from psoriasis. After just one week of daily use the result are INCREDIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Jennika

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and not too greasy. Just the right amount of moisture
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. The scent is very pleasant. It keeps my skin moisturized and I am 66, tan and my skin is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Grannyjsmith

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Cocoa Butter
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I’d used Palmer’s cocoa butter for the majority of the last 20 years and stumbled across this oil looking for something to help reduce some scars I have. I’m not sure it’s helped those, but I’ve started using every morning when I get out of the shower. It moisturizes as well - if not better - than the butter and is light enough that I can use on my face as well, which I did initially because I ran out of face cream but it has actually had the unexpected benefit of helping to reduce how greasy my face gets in this Florida humidity throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: LRay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t contain an efficacious concentration of Rose Hip oil.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t really an improvement on the original Oil; I should have read the ingredient list. My hope was that it would have a higher concentration of Rose Hip oil, and that the pump would prevent oxidation, so the Vitamins in rose hip Would be better preserved and able to act on my skin to prevent discoloration, but in reality it’s a Rose Hip scent, which isn’t bad, just not what I was going for. I’d give the standard Palmer’s oil a 4.5 or 5, this comes in at a 3 or 3.5.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah J.

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome. Fades dark spots on old skin
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome. Fades dark spots on old skin. Really great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Good oil!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on a surgical scar. The oil penetrates quickly and softens the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a miracle product. But if your consistent ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a miracle product. But if your consistent with it as the directions say( 3x a day on desired areas) it does help tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Mariclaire Nardulli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me lessen the redness of my stretch marks and my skin is glowing after each shower. I use it while my skin is still wet right after each shower. I also used to have bumps on my arms and this completely got rid of them (I had even tried medicated lotion from a dr. that did not work and have had the bumps since I was a child). It is not overly oily and soaks into your skin quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann McAndrew

customer_reviews.title: So Good.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I found the easiest way to use this is to mix it in with another lotion. I like CeraVe, its unscented and is a good quality lotion. Pump however much lotion you want into your hand and then I pump the Palmer's oil right into it before mixing it in my hands and putting it where needed. I feel like it is less messy this way. Makes my skin so soft.
customer_reviews.author: PythiaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a little over a week to relieve extremely dry skin during my pregnancy. This product seems to have done the trick. I especially like the rose hip fragrance as it is subtle and not overly strong or perfume-esque has some rose scented items tend to be. I also particularly enjoy and appreciate that this oil is not incredibly oily. A little goes a long way and it quickly absorbs into the skin rather than your clothing. I will update my review after I have used it for a more extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: bbhart18

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: NOT GENUINE! I have nooooo clue what was sent to me but, THIS IS NOT PALMERS SKIN THERAPY OIL. The oil is dark, has no scent, and the consistency is thick like cooking oil, none of this is like the Palmer’s I typically purchase (at least once a month). Furthermore, it STILL hasn't absorbed in my skin after 15 minutes. The real body oil absorbs after 5 minutes. I requested a new bottle be sent and I guess I’ll see if the REAL product gets sent out, not this fake mess. If I receive the genuine product, I’ll update. UPDATE: Received 2nd bottle, same deal. Both went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Parke

customer_reviews.title: My sister loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly effective and nourishing. My sister loves it so much, that's all she wanted for her Bday! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alabado

customer_reviews.title: Not good, don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: If you’re getting this to prevent stretch marks on your belly and trouble areas while pregnant... don’t. I put this stuff on everywhere for 8 months and it did nothing. These ingredients are not only questionable safety-wise, they’ve been proven to do nothing in regards to preventing stretch marks. Try tamanu oil, it has actually been proven to repair + prevent stretch marks. Erin’s Faces has a great quality one. I’m in no way endorsed to say that, I just have been doing my research 10 months postpartum
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is very moisturizing and smells so nice! It has a rose scent but not overpowering. I bought this product to help reduce the appearance of surgical scars and it seems to be helping. The price is great & it makes my skin feel fabulously soft when used after shower/bath. This can be used as a massage oil also. I will update this review in a couple of months to give a better perspective.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Love my palmers oil😍❤🌹
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil alot. It came quick & was not leaking, It's super moisturizing & the scent, I love the scent it has. It is not too over powering or too weak, it is just right w/ the scent it has. Now, I've gotten this for my stretch marks (of course) that I have & this had really good rating & reviews so I wanted to try it out plus it's really affordable not like the other brands that are way over priced & have iffy ratings & reviews,but, I'm really excited about this & I will do an update later on when I see results.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Using it on my belly for stretch marks. 22 weeks and not a single one. Tried using it on my breasts but it made them break out. I have very sensitive and acne prone skin, so that wasn’t a big suprise.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. Helps with mild dry skin. Also helps to get rid of scars/bumps from shaving on my legs. I put it on once a day (every other day sometimes, when I forget)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Baxter

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! Order now!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous in every way! Absorbs into skin INCREDIBLY well, especially for an oil. I ordered this initially to help ease the itch of a pregnant belly and have been converted to long term use; preferred to lotion and even palmer’a coco butter. I can’t emphasize enough how well it both moisturizes and absorbs into the skin. I ordered the rosehip fragrance; it’s wonderful! My ONLY small complaint is that it has Red 17 dye in it for coloring, which I don’t feel is necessary- but the product is so wonderful that will not keep me from using it long-term. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it works (or helps) natural healing?
customer_reviews.text: I had a cyst removed in which the dermatologist took no care in trying not to leave a scar. I have been applying this nightly and it seems to be helping to fade-away a nasty scar. It may be part the oil and part time but it doesn't hurt to use it. LOTS of product and it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Goody2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly like cheap chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily after a shower on my stomach to avoid pregnancy stretch marks. I have some existing marks from a previous pregnancy and haven't noticed any more show up or the existing ones getting worse. My stretch marks don't itch like un-moisturized ones are prone to, so it at least works for that. My only complaint is that it smells like cheap milk chocolate. I really dislike the smell, so I only use it at night right before I go to bed so I don't spend all day smelling like dollar store chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Gara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this skin oil! My daughter has suffered from dry skin since she was an infant. We have tried expensive lotions, creams for both dry and eczema prone skin and nothing has ever helped with her dry skin issues. I waited a few weeks to write this review to see how well it worked and I have nothing negative to say. It keeps her skin well hydrated and she uses it daily. The smell is also phenomenal. I highly recommended this product if you suffer from dry skin or are even looking to hydrate it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: leaves skin smooth
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for stretch marks, and just as a general substitute for lotion. I love the way this makes my skin feel. It has not totally gotten rid of stretch marks (I didn't really expect it to) but it has made them much less red. I have only been using this for about 2 weeks, and it is recommended to use longer for stretch marks. I like the original cocoa scent. Personally, I do not find it too strong, but I also do not usually wear a different scent at all. I'm not sure if it would clash with a different scent
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for silky skin
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this body oil! It has a sweet coco butter scent, which some may not lik but I do and it’s not so stop going that it overpowers my perfume. Most of all it’s soooo kind to my skin. I struggle with eczema and this really helps not only to keep it at bay (as long as I use it consistently) but also leaves my skin feeling silky. I just put it on as soon as I get out of the shower however I do have to Massage it in pretty thoroughly before dressing or it will stain delicate fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far! I use it to prevent stretch marks.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, and my skin feels soft. I don't know how effective is this, I am using it to prevent stretch marks, I am now 5 month into my pregnancy, and hope it works as my pregnancy progresses.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: No stretchmarks but no rosehip
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this along with Earth Mama belly butter and have no stretch marks! I thought that this product had rosehip oil but it does not. It smells floral. I read a lot about the benefits of rosehip oil and should have read the ingredients first. I would have purchased the original oil vs. this floral scented one (not a fan of floral scents). However, I am super happy not to have any stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: It is mainly canola oil!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for winter time dry skin on hands and feet. It was recommended in an article for diabetic shin care. It is true OIL (canola) and just as runny. It does not absorb well . After rubbing for several minutes I must wash my hands (that I just tried to oil) to avoid touching anything and leaving an oily smear. It does not relieve the dry cracking skin on the backs of my hands, and the small little tears of winter are beginning to appear. Medium priced hand lotions work better!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: I had knee replacement and once the incision was healed I started massaging it with this. It is oil but doesn't feel oily, it gets absorbed into the skin and feels so soothing and smells so good. At night I apply this and then wrap the knee overnight and i the morning it seems the scar is disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burki

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells amazing, like chocolate! I love how it makes my skin feel. It keeps me moisturized, but I don't know that I have noticed any scar reduction after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: nadams

customer_reviews.title: If you want to smell like playdoh!
customer_reviews.text: If you like to smell like Playdoh and itching, go for it! I just tested it out and I smell like I just rubbed playdoh all over my body. Seeing I’m pregnant and my sense of smell is to the 10th degree of powerfullness. I had my husband smell my stomach to confirm I smelled like a small jar of mushy putty. Oh and then the 9th hell of itching started. Only put it on 15 minutes ago and I’m now jumping in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Parahus

customer_reviews.title: Prevents stretch marks VERY WELL!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. I’m 30 weeks pregnant, have been using this since 12, and I am stretch mark free. Here’s a tip: don’t forget to moisturize your thighs (if you’re pregnant)! I put this oil all over my belly, boobs, arms, shoulders; everywhere but my thighs and I had a little bit of stretch marks there at 20 weeks. I started using this oil on my thighs since then and they’ve dramatically gone away. This oil works miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE WITH THE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: This body oil smells like fresh chocolates it glides on smoothly onto my skin with a nice after sheen. The smell lingers all day as well i love this oil and will be stocking up. I'm using it on my elbows, stomach, thighs, and any dark marks pretty much anywhere on my skin. I'll give an update in a month or two after usage but so far..I'm loving it :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love Palmers
customer_reviews.text: I love this Palmers Body Oil, absorbes quickly and does not leave skin feeling sticky or oily. I have extra dry skin so I moisturize daily and Palmers is perfect. Great prices at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this as a sample size from the complete stretch mark box from Palmer’s I decided to buy this. I Purchased this on 1/23 for some scarring on my ankles due to bug bites. I’ve been applying this once to twice every day. I can see it working! It takes time, as it’s not going to work overnight. It doesn’t feel greasy, it hydrated my skin and doesn’t rub off on clothing! If you’re on the fence about purchasing this product... just do it! You won’t regret it! It’s a big container too - meaning it’ll last for all your scars/stretch mark needs :)
customer_reviews.author: mc.

customer_reviews.title: Have to use it often to see results and not just once a day. About 3 and massage it in
customer_reviews.text: It helped with a cut and never scarred up. Been trying on other areas that need moisturizes but I can see it’s helping with scars and scratches from a thorn bush
customer_reviews.author: Bomb

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightness and feel And smell of the oil. Be aware it does have canola oil but it seems fine. It has lightened up my scar tremendously but it hasn’t been the 8 weeks yet like it recommends. I’m hopeful it will lighten even more. I’ve used this for years and have been coming back to it. It’s light enough for your face and doesn’t break me out.
customer_reviews.author: Shania

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, a little greasy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as a nighttime facial moisturizer, and have been pretty please with it. Although I've not seen a drastic improvement in my skin's texture and tone, my face definitely feels much more supple and hydrated. 4 stars because it does feel greasy-I prefer something that sinks in better, but it absolutely has helped with dry, flaky winter skin, so it's worth putting up with the greasy feel at night.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, silky, goes on well and a little goes a long way! Currently 7.5 months pregnant and I’ve been using this for a few months now. No new stretch marks and my skin feels great! The Rose smell is not overwhelming for me even though it’s not my fave
customer_reviews.author: Mel Mar McQuay

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Ordering more now since I’m almost out. I’ve been using this everyday along with a $3 blackhead srub for several months. My skin looks so clear I’ve even stopped wearing make-up the last couple of months. I also use a bentonite clay mask once every 7-14 days, that helps to!! But this product leaves your skin with a healthy glow all year round. It’s perfect for my combination oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic moisturizer and great for scars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product- much better than any lotion. Scent is ok but better than just the pure cocoa butter scent, which is way too strong for me. Great for massaging scars.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great oil moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: So I really like this moisturizer. It’s oil but I goes on clean and dries out relatively quickly. The scent is also great and it claims it’s good for scars and healing (too soon to tell). Only thing is if you put too much on one area it stays oily for awhile so distribution on the skin is key!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ulin

customer_reviews.title: Has helped with dry, itchy & sensitive winter skin
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a difference in my skin since using this product. I have dry/sensitive skin that gets a bit worse in the Winter months. Since using this for couple months I have noticed a difference in moisture and am not itching. Highly recommend and will definitely be using again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kara c

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This product helped so much with my very dry back don't ask me why it's always drive but it is and helped with acne
customer_reviews.author: Katie King

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes on a whole different level.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this after moving to the desert when regular palmer’s lotion just wasn’t cutting it any more (and that stuff is super rich). My skin stopped feeling scaly for the first time in what felt like years. I no longer live in a super dry climate, but I still use it on alternating days. It might be a bit too much if you live in an area with high humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Scott

customer_reviews.title: horrible in every way
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible, I instantly refunded it the moment I read the ingredients not to mention smelled it. Why is the first ingredient canola oil? I literally have canola oil in my kitchen, I don’t need to spend 10 dollars for it in a bottle. The smell is so horribly pungent and I ordered the scentless one. My leg feels sticky and gross. It arrived late asf too. Definitely giving this away. It’d be dead space on my counter otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley Truitt

customer_reviews.title: Reviving my skin
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the first time yesterday! Still seeing the results of the oil on the back of my hands. Skin looks healthy and supple. Can't wait to use on other parts of the body!
customer_reviews.author: Laura JOM Wissa

customer_reviews.title: No stretch marks during pregnancy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this oil to every expectant moms! I used this oil throughout my pregnancy and have NO stretch marks (and we have them genetically in our family!). I have few marks on hips where I wasn't using this oil, but nothing on my tummy where I used this oil daily after every shower. My skin was very hydrated and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at preventing stretch marks!
customer_reviews.text: I love slathering this on my pregnant belly every night! It smells wonderful and isn’t too greasy or oily (has never left a stain or marking on my clothing and I put a t shirt on right after I use it). I’m 37 weeks pregnant and so far no stretch marks! It leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Allie Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Very strong odor to product. Allergy sufferers beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to work on the scar from my knee replacement. I have used this brand previously but In different form. This one has such a strong odor I immediately had an allergy reaction from it. I ended up giving it to my PT for someone who could tolerate the smell. Really sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. I use it on my 30 year old stretch marks for a month now. Im so amazed how it has almost completely lightened my stretch marks from that ugly red color to my natural body color. I have more confidence. I can wear a bikini again. I am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: peppercorn

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer. Strengthens skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body oil. I use it every day fresh out of the shower and it absorbs quickly and is not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Achievers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love.. would buy this over and over again. Just not from amazon simply because they’re in retail stores like Target and I didn’t realize that until after I purchased it from here. Anyways it’s moisturizing and the scent is amazing. It came to me in perfect condition. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing - strong cocoa odor
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizing - strong cocoa odor. I added lavender oil and now it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Zingarella

customer_reviews.title: Good but oily!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for my scar post-surgery. Overall, it works well and smells.m nice, but super runny! Would be nice if it had a better pump or something to help with keeping it from going everywhere. Also leaves everything really oily and takes a while to absorb into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa A

customer_reviews.title: this is a lovely product
customer_reviews.text: ohmygosh, i LOVE this product. i tossed every other moisturizing product i had once i was sure i wasn't having any side-effects. this is an all-purpose item. no fancy expensive packaging. can't speak to whether it helps with scars or stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: bookishgal

customer_reviews.title: Oh that smell
customer_reviews.text: I got the original and the scent is not my favorite. It says it has perfume in the ingredients, but I gave no idea what the intention for scent was supposed to be. Other than the scent it didn't leave me greasy. Haven't used long enough to see a difference on my scars, but pleased so far other than the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: A New Part of My Beauty Regime!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil on my face as directed (three times a day), everyday for a week now and I have noticed quite the difference. My skin is already improving. My skin is glowing and my skin tone is gradually evening out.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after major abdominal surgery that left me with a scar past both hips and between my pubic area and bra. The oil has made my scar not only look SO much better but it feels better too. I waited a couple months after my surgery to start using this.
customer_reviews.author: Reay Clan

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I usually mix it with a little bit of body lotion so it’s hydrating and smoothing. I use it very day and my skin is always smooth. I would say it does make your skin a little oily, but haven’t had any issues with the oil coming off on my clothes or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Souji23

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this through my whole pregnancy (currently 27 weeks and 4 days) and I don't have a single stretcmark and my skin is very moisturized. It doesn't stain my clothes or make me feel greasy. I just butter myself up after my shower and again before bed and I'm good to go. It also helps freshly shaved legs stay smooth longer!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! Smells heavenly! Leaves my skin feeling soft and surprisingly not oily. I will mix it in with my body lotion sometimes instead of applying it directly. I haven't used it on my face, I have their vitamin e oil that I use instead.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: works well but the bottle squirts out more liquid with each pump than other brands i have bought on amazon. this is not a problem for me but it was not expected and could be a bit messy for some people who only want a small amount for a specfic body area
customer_reviews.author: S.W.G.

customer_reviews.title: Best there is...
customer_reviews.text: I use Palmers every day. It has helped repair my sun damaged skin. So important in my daily skin and body moisturizing routine.
customer_reviews.author: beth elzer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely body oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this body oil! I had bought a sample size on the rose scent and I didn’t like it at first but then it grew on me. I definitely love this scent compared to the original scent. Very moisturizing and is thin so it’s easy to distribute all over my body.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best oil for my family. I've been use this oil for my belly since I pregnant. Now my husband and I use it togather for moisturizer. He has sensitive skin so can't use other body lotions or oils but this one. It is very good for your dry skin not only stretch mark.
customer_reviews.author: RFJ

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite skin oils
customer_reviews.text: I started using this products as my belly started getting bigger and I realized this is a great product all all around pregnant or not. It keeps my skin soft, shinny, and moisturized for a good amount of time and I love the smell..also the appearance was nice when it arrived, box was perfectly intact, the bottle wasn't greasy, it didnt look used, and it came a day early..
customer_reviews.author: lashonna

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of samples of this product first and then decided that a had to purchase a bottle. This leaves your skin silky smooth without feeling greasy. My skin seems to be getting more dry with age, so this product really helps. I put this product on my face (although they do have a similar product just for the face) before I put on my foundation; makes application so much easier! Says the product helps with stretch marks, but I'm not sure how long you have to continually use the product before you notice a difference. Will buy again, but the bottle should last me quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Wallace

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I seen palmers lotions had great reviews but It doesn't work for everyone. The lotion wasn't as moisturizing and I was still very itchy on my tummy. I also had purchased the Serum to make it a combo. The serum said it was supposed to reduce the coloring of the stretch marks but it seemed like it was making it darker for some reason. Over all not what I expected. I switched to Aveeno Moisturizing and WOW I wish I started using that from the beginning. In a week it lightened up the marks on my stomach and I have not had any new marks.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is awesome! I’ve been using it for years. The dispenser is the greatest invention ever! I use it everyday after showering. I get compliments all the time on how soft my skin feels.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. It is important to restate it again. Product has a very nice fragrance. Works wonderfully on scars, dry/chapped skin and stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought this product several times already. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an oil. Best used in the shower before the towel. Haven’t noticed a difference in my stretch marks which is why I originally bought it but it makes my skin smooth and soft without a residue so I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Very greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m not a huge fan, but I think it does it’s job. I wasn’t that thrilled with the smell, even though it is mild. But I would’ve been willing to overlook that if the consistency was better. It is sooo greasy!! I know it’s oil, but I’ve used other brands that soak into the skin better. This just sits on your skin and feels gross, in my opinion. I feel like I can’t put clothes on for a long time after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil for pregnant woman
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice to apply on your belly while pregnant. I did not have any stretch marks before I get pregnant and at my 7th month of pregnancy I still don't have. It smells very well and also does not fell heavy on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Thaís Knights

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love Palmers, so decided to try the body oil,, I spray it on after I get out of the tub when I'm still a little wet, let it sink in & then pat dry..its wonderful...you can also use it for so many other things..so glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamella McFall

customer_reviews.title: I love the sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love the sweet, rich scent of this oil. I use it on wet skin before patting dry. I have normal skin so I don't really need to use moisturizer after applying this. This would be a really nice addition to a moisturizing routine for dryer skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Smell is AWFUL and strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell of powder is so strong I can’t use it nor can anyone in my house as the scent just lingers. It may work but I’m not able to give it a chance. I have used Palmer products before and expected a much different smell. If you are sensitive to smells as I am this is not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Irishbrat88

customer_reviews.title: 3 pregnancys not one stretch mark
customer_reviews.text: 8 months pregnant and have used this for all three of my pregnancys and not one stretchmark.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique crawford

customer_reviews.title: Go get you someeeeeeeee!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the BEST!!!!! I haven’t even been using it for a long time and it’s already doing wonders. My skin is starting to look even more flawless than usual. I recommend this to everybody! Go get you someeeeeeeeee
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure my stretch marks aren't going anywhere but this helps reduce them a bit! And makes my skin super soft. So when my baby plays the drums on my stomach I can at least be happy about that and not so upset that a trampoline has replaced my once hard abs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just good for the skin
customer_reviews.text: My last girlfriend introduced me to this as a product she has used (or one similar) for 30 years. She is 49 and looks 30! Her skin is soft and glowing and flawless head to toe. I enjoyed rubbing it on her and it is not greasy like other oils so a nice rub down, done right, doesn't mess up your sheets. Its a sensual experience guys- not intended for the other- LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used this 1-2 times a day along with the cocoa butter lotion from 15 weeks pregnant until delivery and didn’t get a single stretch mark. Maybe just lucky? The oil also never stained any of my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith E.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this every evening after my bath. Light feeling and smells pretty darn good. I just ordered another bottle and moved the previous bottle to the guest bath, still for me though. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I ordered a small one in a set, then ran out so I purchased this larger one. It's very moisturizing. I'm currently 7 months pregnant and trying to do all I can to keep this belly moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face at night to help with sun spots in my forehead. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mikka Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Improves postpartum stretch marks!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a little over a month, in combination with the Palmer's stretch mark massage cream, and it has definitely improved the appearance of my stretch marks! I used the cream and lotion during pregnancy as well. I hope to continue to see improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Mom&Dad

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: It works really well to minimize the appearance of stretch marks. I have been using it for about a month now and was really surprised to see the difference. It won't get rid of them of course but it will minimize their appearance. It smells great and is really moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: aubrey iwanicki

product_meta.title: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Skin Therapy Moisturizing Body Oil with Vitamin E, Rosehip Fragrance | 5.1 Ounces
product_meta.description: Style:Rosehip Fragrance| Size:5.1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)This oil is a skin perfecting product that can be used all over the body including the face. It can be used daily, to hydrate the skin. It helps in improving the appearance of scars, stretch marks, dry and damaged skin and uneven skin tone.
feature_bullets: MOISTURIZING BODY OIL: This 24-hour moisturizing body oil with Rosehip fragrance helps to improve the appearance of scars, stretch marks, dry, damaged skin, uneven skin tone, aging skin & fine lines & wrinkles.
SPECIAL FORMULA: Made with Cocoa Butter to moisturize, Argan Oil to soften & condition, plus a blend of ingredients to hydrate & improve skin imperfections, & promote healthy skin cell rejuvenation.

FINEST INGREDIENTS: We strive to use only the finest natural, raw ingredients to bring you soft, hydrated & beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter & Coconut Oil worldwide.

CHOOSE WHAT'S REAL: Our beauty products & hair & skin treatments feature real high-quality, plant-based ingredients in formulas that really work to hydrate & soften, from lip balm to bar soap to body butter.

PALMER'S SKIN CARE: Our Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, & Vitamin E product lines include creams, balms, lotions, oils & soaps for hand & body, face, lip, sun care, hair care & pregnancy & stretch mark care.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
